https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin._instruction: Add one or several files in which this parcellation terminology is stored in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin.description: Reference to a file instance in which something is stored.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin.label: Defined in
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin.name: definedIn

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.label: Full name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.name: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.description: Reference to an original form where the essence was preserved, but presented in an alternative form.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.label: Is alternative version of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.name: isAlternativeVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew._instruction: Add the earlier version of this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.label: Is new version of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.name: isNewVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.label: Short name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.name: shortName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation terminology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionInnovation
